ai-tha-ap370:0.3_0: The Elder Campā on the Earth
ai-tha-ap370:1.1_0: “The Buddha is peace, the Buddha is awakened,
ai-tha-ap370:1.4_0: I came to the supreme city.
ai-tha-ap370:2.2_0: in the last watch of the night.
ai-tha-ap370:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap370:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap370:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Campaka.
ai-tha-ap370:6.1_0: One Campaka was the eighth Roja flowers
